 上一个软件包   下一个软件包 框架    无框架    

软件包 storm.dsp.bolt

类摘要
AlarmBolt This storm bolt is used to collect alarms sent by ProcessingBolt then do something, by example, send to NewSCADA system
DispatcherBolt This class is used for dispatching messages got from Spout, and do something before sending to ProcessingBolt
PrinterBolt Just for testing Print all the tuples incoming
ProcessingBolt This is a Storm Bolt for processing the input data.
